title: Definitions
context: [ยง201C-1] Definitions. For the purposes of this chapter: &ldquo;Department&rdquo; means the department of business, economic development, and tourism. &ldquo;Financial mall&rdquo; means an array of financial service industry operations connected by telecommunications and not restricted to location in a single physical facility. &ldquo;Financial services industry&rdquo; means trading and brokering operations, including but not limited to securities, commodities, debt instruments, currencies, options, futures, and other derivatives. [L 1990, c 107, pt of ยง3]
